name: Better Progression
description: Adds a leveling / EXP system to Geometry Dash with upgradable badges!

bar-color.name: Disable Dynamic Tier Bar Color
bar-color.description:
Disables the tier bar color being a similar color to a profile's tier badge.

With this setting enabled, all tier bar colors will be set to <cg>Green</c>.

most-exp-icon.name: Disable Most EXP Icon
most-exp-icon.description: Removes the icon on the tier badge that shows where most of the user's EXP comes from.

disable-tier-bar.name: Disable Tier Bar
disable-tier-bar.description:
Removes the tier bar that shows whenever you complete a level.

<cp>The tier bar will still appear when you level up your Tier.</c>

disable-open-check.name: Disable EXP Update on Startup
disable-open-check.description:
Removes the check for a change in EXP on startup.

<cg>Useful on Android where saving mod data may not work as intended.</c>
